700553f-a.text:
(1)
Boston Road, south side, east from Palmer to Boller Avenues. The area is ocoupied by a gasoline station and Slim's Diner.
June 16, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
Slim's Diner, at the S.W. corner of Boller Avenue.
June 16, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.
700553f-a.folder: Boston Road & Palmer Avenue, Bronx, NY
